en.banner_describe: Manager is OpenStack's web visualization project, providing users a friendly interactive experience. Everybody can control the operation of the cloud service.
en.feature_four_intro: Effectively manage, maintain and track questions.
en.feature_three_intro: Custom multi-level approval to meet business process needs.
en.feature_two_intro: Through the Keystone to do a unified account management.
en.show_one_introduction: Including compute, storage, network, authentication, scheduling, monitoring and other core functions.
en.show_three_introduction: 100% compatible with native OpenStack API. Supports fully autonomous definition of network architecture and topology, support for web panel / CLI / API operations.
en.show_two_introduction: Including user management, resource management, service management, cluster management and other management functions.
en.solve_one_introduction: Modular architecture, support plug-ins, easy and fast expansion, easy to solve the problem of custom development.
en.solve_two_introduction: In-depth understanding of OpenStack function operation, well designed, simplified operation, allowing users to quickly get started OpenStack.
en.solve_three_introduction: SPA architecture, the ultimate performance optimization, smooth user experience.
en.title: UnitedStack - UOS Manager

zh.banner_brief: 量身定制专属用户界面
zh.banner_brief_mobile: OpenStack 的前端可视化项目。
zh.banner_describe: Manager 是 OpenStack 的前端可视化项目，对用户提供良好的视觉界面及友好的交互体验。任何对 OpenStack 命令不熟悉的管理员都可以轻松驾驭云服务的操作。
zh.feature_four_intro: 有效管理，维护和追踪问题和请求。
zh.feature_one_intro: 同时支持 OpenStack 和 Ceph 等开源平台。
zh.feature_three_intro: 自定义多级审批，满足企业流程需求。
zh.feature_two_intro: 通过 Keystone 对多平台做统一账号管理。
zh.show_one_intro: 核心 OpenStack 功能全覆盖
zh.show_one_introduction: 包含了计算，存储，网络，认证，编排，监控等核心功能。
zh.show_three_introduction: 100% 兼容原生 OpenStack API。支持完全自主定义网络架构和拓扑，支持web面板／CLI/API操作。
zh.show_two_introduction: 包含了用户管理，资源管理，服务管理，集群管理等管理功能。
zh.solve_one_introduction: 模块化架构，支持插件，方便快速扩展，轻松解决定制化开发难题。
zh.solve_two_introduction: 深入理解 OpenStack 功能操作，精心设计，简化操作，让用户快速上手 OpenStack。
zh.solve_three_introduction: SPA 架构，极致的性能优化，流畅的用户体验。
zh.title: UnitedStack - UOS Manager
